item.title: Recucling bin not emptied for months, 12th October
item.description:
The hackney recycling bin has not been emptied for months. It is overflowing and needs emptying regularly. It is used by all local residents and fills quickly.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Harrington Hill, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped corner Dunloe and Dawson, 12th October
item.description:
I have a lock on my rubbish bin because it gets filled by absolutely everyone but me. However someone still thinks itâ€™s ok to leave their rubbish on the street. I have no idea who it is but it often happens on a Sunday and it gets on my nerves!

item.title: Used boxes and furniture left in the undercroft, 12th October
item.description:
The people living at Flat 2, Grantham Court, SE166PT have been leaving used furniture, and a large amount of boxes (as you can see it is the same name on all boxes) in the undercroft in the bin area without properly disposing of them nor even putting them in the appropriate bins. The pieces of furniture would not be removed by the garbage collectors anyway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eleanor Close, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and other waste, 12th October
item.description:
This is the latest flight tipping from a very long running series outside number 20 Glenarm Road. It is clear that serious enforcement action will be needed if this pattern is going to be stopped.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glenarm Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Swing welding failed, 12th October
item.description:
The weld joint on this swing has failed and there is a fracture. It could suddenly break and injure people.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sayes Court Street, New Cross, London

item.title: Illegal parking of Limebikes, 12th October
item.description:
Limebike app allowing users to illegally park on footway in front of parking and residents. Causing dangerous obstruction in public space and causing significant healthy and safety concern. Have seen blind and elderly nearly trip over fallen limebikes.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southgate Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Car not moved for months. Parked in Middle of two car park spots and alarm has gone off day and night., 12th October
item.description:
This abandoned car with NO MOT has been left here for months and has not moved. Its windows are cracked, front tyres fully flat and alarm has gone off during the day and night. Its parked in the middle of two visitors bays and one of the only locations in the area that visitors can come and park. No know residence on group chats have taken responsibility nor know of the owner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Morgan Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
